unsaved-changes.body: You have unsaved changes. Data you have entered will not be saved.

auth.hide-password: Click to hide password from view

external.title: Aalto University users

local.body: If you have been provided with credentials specifically for Aalto Grades, use this login.

password.old: New password cannot be the same as the old password

create-part.title: Create new course part
create-part.days-valid-help: How long the grades should stay valid for
create-part.max-grade-help: Maximum allowed grade for course part

models.could-not-find-model: Couldn't find grading model with ID {{model}}
models.could-not-find-grade: Couldn't find grades for user with ID {{user}}

models.cannot-delete-with-final: Cannot delete a model with final grades

parts.delete-message: Some models are using this course part. Are you sure you want to delete it?
parts.hidden: Some course parts are hidden due to not having any data

upload.higher-than-max: Some grades are higher than the maximum allowed values
upload.expiry-after-completion: Expiry date must be after completion date
upload.import-as-twice: The same "Import as" value cannot appear twice

a+.select-for-fetching: Select the course parts you want to fetch grades for from A+.
a+.fetching-grades-wait: Fetching grades from A+, this may take a few minutes...

course-results.group-by-latest-grade: Group by the latest obtainment date of all course parts
course-results.select-one-student-calculation: Select at least one student number for grade calculation.
course-results.calculate-final-for-selected: Calculate course final grades for selected students.
course-results.select-one-student-download: Select at least one student number for downloading grades.
course-results.pending-download: Grades with status "PENDING" cannot be downloaded, unselect or calculate grades for these.
course-results.download-as-sisu-compat-csv: Download final course grades as a Sisu compatible CSV file.
course-results.group-columns: Group rows based on other columns
course-results.show-model-parts: Show only course parts used in the model
course-results.multiple-final: Multiple final grades, click to show
course-results.final-downloaded: Final grades downloaded in the Sisu CSV format successfully.
course-results.download-at-least-one: You must download data for at least one student.
course-results.download-final-as-sisu-csv: Download final grades as Sisu CSV
course-results.grading-date-default: Grading date defaults to the latest submission of the student.
course-results.override-date: Override grading date for all students
course-results.included-before: The list of students includes students who have already been included in a Sisu CSV previously. Please select a download option from the drop-down menu.
course-results.will-not-close: This dialog will NOT close after downloading a CSV file. You may download multiple CSV files with different options
course-results.download-all-selected: Download all selected grades in a single CSV
course-results.exported-already: User grade has been exported to Sisu already.
course-results.model-has-deleted-and-archived: Grading model contains deleted & archived course parts
course-results.model-has-archived: Grading model contains archived course parts
course-results.model-has-deleted: Grading model contains deleted course parts
course-results.using-latest: You are using latest grades instead of the best grades to calculate the final grades.
course-results.some-grade-invalid: Some of the selected grades are invalid.
course-results.some-final-invalid: Some final grades will have invalid values, check if the correct grading model is being used
course-results.expiry-before: Expiry date cannot be before date

source.tooltip: Source code opens in a new tab

feedback.tooltip: Feedback form opens in a new tab

front-page.no-courses: You have no courses. Please contact support to have your course added.
front-page.delete-user-message: Are you usre you want to delete the user {{user}}?

create-course.title: Create a new course
create-course.max-below-min: Maximum credits cannot be lower than minimum credits
create-course.department-select: Please select the organizing department of the course
create-course.name-english: Please input a valid course name in English
create-course.name-finnish: Please input a valid course name in Finnish
create-course.name-swedish: Please input a valid course name in Swedish
create-course.course-code-help: Give code for the new course.
create-course.organizing-department-help: Select the organizing department of the new course
create-course.grading-scale-help: Grading scale of the course, e.g., 0-5 or pass/fail.
create-course.language-help: Language in which the course will be conducted.
create-course.input-at-least-one-teacher: Input the email address of at least one teacher in charge of the course

create-course.add-assistant-emails: Add emails of the assistants of the course.

node.average-tooltip: Take the (weighted) average of multiple values
node.stepper-tooltip: Map ranges of values into specific values
node.min-tooltip: Require minimum value and otherwise output fail or fail course
node.max-tooltip: Take the maximum of multiple values and one custom value
node.require-tooltip: Require some number of non-fail values

delete-message.singular: All of the data of the student will be deleted permanently!
delete-message.plural: All of the data of the students will be deleted permanently!
